fields.Name: Категории
fields.sql:
select __Categories2.Name from dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{B3CD26B1-1807-4A98-90DA-7969244F4E4E}] main WITH (NOLOCK) 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{BDE9E801-9FB5-4D5C-B604-19F7A73448C1}] __Categories1 WITH (NOLOCK) on Main.InstanceID = __Categories1.InstanceID 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{899C1470-9ADF-4D33-8E69-9944EB44DBE7}] __Categories2 WITH (NOLOCK) on __Categories1.CategoryID = __Categories2.RowID where main.InstanceID = @ID

fields.Name: Количество файлов
fields.sql:
select count (__FileReferences1.SysRowTimestamp) as cnt from dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{B3CD26B1-1807-4A98-90DA-7969244F4E4E}] main WITH (NOLOCK) 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{E962AC85-0F53-4439-A1CD-171E46C3EF91}] __FileReferences1 WITH (NOLOCK) on Main.FilesID = __FileReferences1.InstanceID where main.InstanceID = @ID

fields.Name: Ссылки на карточки

select __Instances.Description, __CardReferences.URL, __Folders.Name from dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{B3CD26B1-1807-4A98-90DA-7969244F4E4E}] main WITH (NOLOCK) 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{7EF9FFB7-2E6D-416B-8145-F1713D77CD2B}] __CardReferences WITH (NOLOCK) on Main.InstanceID = __CardReferences.InstanceID 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvsys_instances] __Instances WITH (NOLOCK) on __CardReferences.Link = __Instances.InstanceID 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{FE27631D-EEEA-4E2E-A04C-D4351282FB55}] __Folders WITH (NOLOCK) on __CardReferences.FolderID = __Folders.RowID where main.InstanceID = @ID

select __ChildrenInstances.Description from dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{7213A125-2CA4-40EE-A671-B52850F45E7D}] main WITH (NOLOCK) 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{BBAA81AA-999D-461B-9B74-2A60A0965555}] __ChildrenRes WITH (NOLOCK) on Main.InstanceID = __ChildrenRes.InstanceID 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvsys_instances] __ChildrenInstances WITH (NOLOCK) on __ChildrenRes.InstanceID = __ChildrenInstances.InstanceID where main.InstanceID = @ID

fields.Name: Количество подчиненных задач
fields.sql:
select count (__ChildrenRes.SysRowTimestamp) as cnt from dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{7213A125-2CA4-40EE-A671-B52850F45E7D}] main WITH (NOLOCK) 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{BBAA81AA-999D-461B-9B74-2A60A0965555}] __ChildrenRes WITH (NOLOCK) on Main.InstanceID = __ChildrenRes.InstanceID where main.InstanceID = @ID

fields.Name: Связанная карточка
fields.sql:
select __Instances.Description from dvdb.dbo.[dvtable_{E74E5CC1-D8A8-4BB5-80E4-98BEF20549E2}] main WITH (NOLOCK) 
 inner join dvdb.dbo.[dvsys_instances] __Instances WITH (NOLOCK) on Main.CardID = __Instances.InstanceID where main.InstanceID = @ID
